title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content: eds, he'll ascend unless we stop him. We found Cazador and attacked him. Time to destroy him once and for all. Cazador magically ensnared Astarion, summoning him and forcing him into the ritual. We need to help Astarion and destroy Cazador. We defeated Cazador, who retreated to his sarcophagus to heal. He's vulnerable now - all we have to do is open the sarcophagus's lid and finish him off. We brought Astarion to Cazador, who used blood magic to force Astarion into the ritual. We need to help As
